site.name: ZenHaus Estates LLC
site.tagline: Value-add rentals in Southwest Florida—done right.

home.hero_h1: Value-add rentals in Southwest Florida—done right.
home.sub: ZenHaus finds and improves small residential assets, then holds long-term. Local, disciplined, transparent.

value_points.title: Improve thoughtfully
value_points.desc: Unit turns, curb appeal, efficiency, durable finishes.

value_points.title: Rent for stability
value_points.desc: Resident quality, retention, and service-first ops.

sections.title: Acquire
sections.text: We target 2–20 unit residential assets with value-add potential across Southwest Florida.

sections.title: Improve
sections.text: Light-to-moderate renovations focused on durable quality and curb appeal.

sections.title: Rent
sections.text: Resident-first operations for stable occupancy and fewer surprises.

sections.title: Refinance
sections.text: Conservative leverage, DSCR-minded financing to recycle capital.

sections.title: Scale
sections.text: Systems, vendor network, and discipline to repeat the cycle.

partners.agents: Pocket listings welcome. Quick feedback and clean terms.
partners.contractors: Clear scopes, prompt payment, recurring work across the region.
partners.lenders: Stabilized rentals, conservative leverage, transparent updates.

about.body: We acquire, improve, rent, and hold value-add residential properties across Southwest Florida—from Tampa Bay to Naples—operating with straight talk and reliable execution.

updates.intro: Short, practical notes on deals, operations, and the market.

contact.sub: Pick a time that works. If you prefer email, use the form below.

legal.llc_purpose: The purpose of the Company is to engage in the business of acquiring, owning, developing, improving, managing, leasing, and selling real estate of all types, whether residential or commercial, and to carry on any and all lawful activities necessary, incidental, or convenient to the foregoing. The Company may also participate in joint ventures, partnerships, and other collaborative arrangements related to real estate investment and may act as an intermediary or facilitator in real estate transactions to the extent permitted by law.
legal.disclaimer: This site is for informational purposes only and does not constitute an offer to sell or a solicitation of an offer to buy any securities.
